name: ExtendedContactDetail.organization
title: ExtendedContactDetail.organization
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: This contact detail is handled/monitored by a specific organization
element.definition: This contact detail is handled/monitored by a specific organization. If the name is provided in the contact, then it is referring to the named individual within this organization.
element.requirements: Some specific types of contact information can be an handled by an organization (eg legal council is via a specific firm).
